Content: # Sosse ü¶¶ **Discover Sosse** ‚Äî the Selenium Open Source Search Engine built for powerful web archiving, crawling, and search. Explore all its features and capabilities on the [official website](https://sosse.io). Whether you're a developer, researcher, or data enthusiast, Sosse is ready to support your projects. Join the community on [GitHub](https://github.com/biolds/sosse) or [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/biolds1/sosse) to submit feature requests, report bugs, contribute code, or [start a discussion](https://github.com/biolds/sosse/discussions). ## Key Features - üåç **Web Page Search**: Search the content of web pages, including dynamically rendered ones, with advanced queries. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/search.html)) - üïë **Recurring Crawling**: Crawl pages at fixed intervals or adapt the rate based on content changes. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/crawl/policies.html)) - üîñ **Web Page Archiving**: Archive HTML content, adjust links for local use, download required assets, and support dynamic content. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/archive.html)) - üè∑Ô∏è **Tags**: Organize and filter crawled or archived pages using tags for better search and management. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/tags.html))
Translation: # Sosse ü¶¶ **Discover Sosse** ‚Äî the Selenium Open Source Search Engine built for powerful web archiving, crawling, and search. Explore all its features and capabilities on the [official website](https://sosse.io). Whether you're a developer, researcher, or data enthusiast, Sosse is ready to support your projects. Join the community on [GitHub](https://github.com/biolds/sosse) or [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/biolds1/sosse) to submit feature requests, report bugs, contribute code, or [start a discussion](https://github.com/biolds/sosse/discussions). ## Key Features - üåç **Web Page Search**: Search the content of web pages, including dynamically rendered ones, with advanced queries. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/search.html)) - üïë **Recurring Crawling**: Crawl pages at fixed intervals or adapt the rate based on content changes. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/crawl/policies.html)) - üîñ **Web Page Archiving**: Archive HTML content, adjust links for local use, download required assets, and support dynamic content. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/archive.html)) - üè∑Ô∏è **Tags**: Organize and filter crawled or archived pages using tags for better search and management. ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/tags.html))

RowTranslations.originContent: **Discover Sosse** ‚Äî the Selenium Open Source Search Engine built for powerful web archiving, crawling, and search.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **Discover Sosse** ‚Äî the Selenium Open Source Search Engine built for powerful web archiving, crawling, and search.

RowTranslations.originContent: Explore all its features and capabilities on the [official website](https://sosse.io).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Explore all its features and capabilities on the [official website](https://sosse.io).

RowTranslations.originContent: Whether you're a developer, researcher, or data enthusiast, Sosse is ready to support your projects.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Whether you're a developer, researcher, or data enthusiast, Sosse is ready to support your projects.

RowTranslations.originContent: Join the community on [GitHub](https://github.com/biolds/sosse) or [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/biolds1/sosse) to submit feature requests, report bugs, contribute code, or [start a discussion](https://github.com/biolds/sosse/discussions).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Join the community on [GitHub](https://github.com/biolds/sosse) or [GitLab](https://gitlab.com/biolds1/sosse) to submit feature requests, report bugs, contribute code, or [start a discussion](https://github.com/biolds/sosse/discussions).

RowTranslations.originContent: - üåç **Web Page Search**: Search the content of web pages, including dynamically rendered ones, with advanced queries.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - üåç **Web Page Search**: Search the content of web pages, including dynamically rendered ones, with advanced queries.

RowTranslations.originContent: - üïë **Recurring Crawling**: Crawl pages at fixed intervals or adapt the rate based on content changes.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - üïë **Recurring Crawling**: Crawl pages at fixed intervals or adapt the rate based on content changes.

RowTranslations.originContent: - üîñ **Web Page Archiving**: Archive HTML content, adjust links for local use, download required assets, and support
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - üîñ **Web Page Archiving**: Archive HTML content, adjust links for local use, download required assets, and support

RowTranslations.originContent: - üè∑Ô∏è **Tags**: Organize and filter crawled or archived pages using tags for better search and management.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - üè∑Ô∏è **Tags**: Organize and filter crawled or archived pages using tags for better search and management.

Content:
- üìÇ **File Downloads**: Batch download binary files from web pages.
  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/download.html))

- üì° **Webhooks**: Integrate with external services using highly flexible webhooks. Connect to proprietary AI platforms
  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/ai_api_processing.html)) or locally hosted solutions
  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/local_ai.html)) to enable advanced data extraction,
  summarization, auto-tagging, notifications, and more.

- üîî **Atom Feeds**: Generate content feeds for websites that don‚Äôt have them, or receive updates when a new page
  containing a keyword is published.
  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/feed_website_monitor.html))

- üîí **Authentication**: The crawler can authenticate to access private pages and retrieve content.
  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guides/authentication.html))

- üë• **Permissions**: Admins can configure crawlers and view statistics, while authenticated users can search or do so anonymously.
  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/permissions.html))

- üë§ **Search Features**: Includes private search history ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/history.html)),
  and external search engine shortcuts ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/user/shortcuts.html)), etc.

Explore the üìö [documentation](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/index.html) and check out some
üì∑ [screenshots](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/screenshots.html).

Sosse is written in Python and is distributed under the [GNU AGPLv3 license](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.en.html). It uses browser-based crawling with [Mozilla Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/) or
[Google Chromium](https://www.chromium.org/Home) alongside [Selenium](https://www.selenium.dev/) to index pages that rely on JavaScript. For faster crawling, [Requests](https://docs.python-requests.org/en/latest/index.html) can also be used. Sosse uses
[PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/) for data storage.

## Try It Out

To quickly try the latest version with Docker:

  ([doc](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/permissions.html))

[PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/) for data storage.

RowTranslations.originContent: To quickly try the latest version with Docker:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: To quickly try the latest version with Docker:

Content:
Then, open [http://127.0.0.1:8005/](http://127.0.0.1:8005/) and log in with the username `admin` and password `admin`.

For persistence of Docker data or alternative installation methods, please refer to the [installation guide](https://sosse.readthedocs.io/en/stable/install.html).

## Stay Connected

Join the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/Vt9cMf7BGK) to get help, share ideas, or discuss Sosse!
